nodes.text: Mustard was an edible item that was served in Dex's Diner as a side order with any sliders, before its destruction in 19 BBY. Varieties included Bimm mustard and Boontaspiced mustard.

Mustard is mentioned in a Hyperspace-exclusive release, "Dining at Dex's" by Gregory Walker, which represents the in-universe menu of Dex's Diner. In real life, mustard is a popular condiment made from the ground seeds of mustard plants.
